sentences.en: A job in Nestle would be ideal, I suppose.
sentences.cn: 我认为在雀巢公司的工作是很理想的.

sentences.en: Examples include: Bosch, Bayer, Nestle, KPMG , Degussa, Schlumberger and many more.
sentences.cn: 我们的主要客户包括: 博世, 拜耳, 雀巢, 毕马威,德固赛, 斯伦贝谢等等.

sentences.en: He nestled his head against her shoulder.
sentences.cn: 他把头靠在她的肩膀上。

sentences.en: It must nestle everywhere, settle everywhere, establish connexions everywhere.
sentences.cn: 它必须到处落户,到处开发, 到处建立联系.

sentences.en: Its snow - white houses nestle cosily in a sea of fresh green vegetation.
sentences.cn: 雪白的房屋舒适地筑在一片翠绿的草木中.

sentences.en: Most people think of chocolates when they hear the name Nestle.
sentences.cn: 多数人在听见雀巢时会想到巧克力.

sentences.en: Ms Nestle explains how the structure of the pet - food industry made things worse.
sentences.cn: Nestle女士进一步解释宠物食品业的结构使情况更糟.

sentences.en: Nestle shares fell about 11 percent in the past 12 months, while Kraft shares dropped percent.
sentences.cn: 在过去12个月里,雀巢公司的股价下跌了约11%, 而卡夫食品公司的股价下跌了13%.

sentences.en: On this breezy idyllic retreat , 36 beachfront bungalows nestle amidst lush vegetation.
sentences.cn: 在这个清风微拂恬淡怡人的去处, 36座海滨别墅坐落在枝叶繁茂的草木间.

sentences.en: Sarah lay there peacefully, the child nestling by her side.
sentences.cn: 萨拉安静地躺在那儿，孩子偎依在她身边。

sentences.en: She tried to nestle deep away in herself.
sentences.cn: 她想让自己深深隐藏起来.

sentences.en: The child nestle up to its mother and fall asleep.
sentences.cn: 那小孩不停地问他母亲问题.

sentences.en: The food conglomerate Nestle SA paid for the study.
sentences.cn: 食品集团雀巢为这项研究提供资金.

sentences.en: Therefore, Nestle the milk powder market for child care has been very good.
sentences.cn: 因此, “雀巢”育儿奶粉的销路一直很好.

sentences.en: Today Nestle said second - half organic sales growth will accelerate.
sentences.cn: 今天,雀巢称,下半年自然销售增长将加快.

sentences.en: Urbanites nestle themselves into highrise apartments, fancy condominiums or low - cost public housing.
sentences.cn: 都市人则把自己窝在高楼公寓 、 华丽的公寓大厦或是廉价的国宅里.

words.tran_cn: 安顿下来；筑巢；把…安置于巢中（nestle的ing形式）
舒适地坐定；偎依；半隐半现地处于

trans.tran_en: to move into a comfortable position, pressing your head or body against someone or against something soft

trans.tran_cn: 安居，舒适地居住，偎依，贴靠，半隐半现地处于，[古语] 筑巢
满意地依偎或紧贴，抱，放，安置
